name: fail2ban-report
description: Fail2Ban-Report is a helper tool for generating reports and summaries from Fail2Ban logs. It parses ban information and produces human-readable overviews, helping admins understand attack patterns over time.
features: Monitoring: Parse Fail2Ban logs, Generate attack reports, Visualize ban patterns. Understand your security posture.
Analytics: Track attack trends over time. Data-driven security insights.
Human-Readable Output: Clear summaries and statistics. Easy to understand.
Automation-Friendly: Integrate with monitoring stacks. Scriptable reporting.
Attack Patterns: Identify common threats. Proactive defense.
Historical Data: Review past incidents. Learn from attacks.
Export Reports: Share security insights. Team collaboration.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage. Efficient processing.
